description:
This pack adds 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt's "Elise," 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt 2's "Asroc," plus 2 additional passive-type Image Pulses, for a total of 10.

After purchasing this DLC, these new Image Pulses will be added to the available rewards for each mission in-game. 
Collect Image Chips before clearing a mission to earn randomly-determined Image Pulses.

*This content is available for free for two weeks after release. After this promotional period, it will become paid content.
name: EX Image Pulses: Elise and Asroc pack
